name: Volvo Car Corporation AB
membership: Volvo Car Corporation is a member of ACEA, EUCAR, FEBIAC and other industry related associations such as the Confederation of Swedish Enterprises and AGORIA.
goal: The Volvo Cars European Affairs Office in Brussels focus is to monitor EU policies and legislation relevant to Volvo Car Corporation activities. It cooperates with EU institutions and other associations, providing technical expertise. It represents Volvo Car Corporation in European associations and vis-à-vis other stakeholders in Brussels.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Trade issues - Brexit, EU-Mercosur; CO2 emissions beyond 2020/21; ITS - Connectivity and Data Protection; RDE - Real Driving Emissions; WLTP - World Light Duty Test Procedure; Review of the GSR regulation; Urban Mobility
